items.food: Oatmeal with almond milk, honey, and bananas
items.quantity: 100g oatmeal, 200ml almond milk, 1 tbsp honey, 1 banana
items.recipe: Cook the oatmeal in almond milk until soft. Stir in honey and top with sliced banana.
Simply enjoy a handful of mixed nuts as a snack.

items.food: Grilled chicken salad with avocado and olive oil dressing
items.quantity: 150g grilled chicken, 100g mixed greens, 1/2 avocado, 2 tbsp olive oil
items.recipe: Grill the chicken and slice. Toss with greens, avocado, and drizzle with olive oil.

items.food: Greek yogurt with honey and walnuts
items.recipe: Mix honey into yogurt and top with chopped walnuts.

items.food: Baked fish with quinoa and steamed vegetables
items.recipe: Bake the fish at 180Â°C for 15 minutes. Cook quinoa as per package instructions and steam vegetables.

items.food: Whole grain toast with avocado and poached eggs
items.quantity: 2 slices whole grain bread, 1 avocado, 2 eggs
items.recipe: Toast the bread, mash avocado on top, and add poached eggs.

items.food: Fruit salad with a drizzle of honey
items.recipe: Chop fruit and mix in a bowl, drizzle with honey.

items.food: Grilled turkey wrap with hummus and vegetables
items.quantity: 100g turkey, 1 whole wheat wrap, 50g hummus, 100g vegetables
items.recipe: Fill wrap with turkey, hummus, and sliced vegetables, then roll it up.

items.food: Protein shake with almond milk and berries
items.quantity: 1 scoop protein powder, 200ml almond milk, 100g mixed berries
items.recipe: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

items.food: Stir-fried tofu with brown rice and mixed vegetables
items.recipe: Stir-fry tofu and vegetables in a pan, serve with cooked brown rice.

items.food: Smoothie bowl with spinach, banana, and protein powder
items.quantity: 100g spinach, 1 banana, 1 scoop protein powder, 200ml almond milk
items.recipe: Blend all ingredients until smooth, pour into a bowl and top with fruit.
Serve carrot sticks with hummus for dipping.

items.food: Whole grain pasta with marinara sauce and grilled chicken

items.food: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and spinach
items.recipe: Bake salmon and sweet potatoes, sautÃ© spinach until wilted.

items.food: Greek yogurt parfait with granola and berries
items.recipe: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a bowl.

items.food: Mixed nuts and a piece of dark chocolate
items.recipe: Enjoy a handful of mixed nuts with a piece of dark chocolate.

items.food: Tuna salad with olive oil and quinoa

items.food: Grilled beef steak with mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables
items.recipe: Grill beef steak, serve with mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables.

items.food: Chia pudding with almond milk and berries

items.food: Quinoa salad with chickpeas and lemon dressing

items.food: Stir-fried shrimp with vegetables and broewn rice
items.recipe: Stir-fry shrimp and vegetables in a pan and serve with brown rice.

items.food: Egg white omelette with spinach and tomatoes
